faq.question: Why do the generated documents look a little strange?

answer.p: Because we are in transition to the new document-v11.dtd and there are still some stylesheets that need tweaking. See the Demo document-v11

faq.question: I have checked out a working copy of xml-forrest CVS, now what?

answer.p: Run "./build.sh docs" to see the initial documentation for Forrest. A new Forrest skin is under development ... "./build.sh clean docs -Duse.skin=bert"

faq.question: I gather that I will be able to use the Forrest infrastructure to build my own website.

answer.p: That is correct. Many of us want to do that, and that is partially why we are working here. Forrest is designed to not only build websites for the various Apache projects, but also so that you can apply your own skins to your own content. Try this ... "./build.sh clean docs -Duse.skin=basic" then copy the basic skin to make your own.
However, it is not yet ready. So please help us to reach that stage.
Join the forrest-dev mailing list and help to discuss it. Read the Forrest Primer for an overview. See the To Do List and choose something that interests you.
